Traits.Name: Void Consumption
Traits.Content: Vorthirith can absorb the essence of creatures within 30 feet. When a creature within this range dies, he can regain hit points equal to half the creature's hit points.

Traits.Name: Eldritch Resurgence
Traits.Content: Whenever Vorthirith successfully hits with an attack, he can gain a bonus to his next damage roll equal to his Intelligence modifier.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: Vorthirith's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells: At will: eldritch blast, mage hand. 3/day each: hunger of hadar, shadow of moil, confusion; 1/day each: power word stun, gate.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If Vorthirith fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Vorthirith makes two attacks with Devourer Bite and one attack with Unraveling Strike.

Actions.Name: Devourer Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +16 to hit, dealing 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Unraveling Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +16 to hit, dealing 45 (7d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target must make a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be grappled as their body begins to unravel under Vorthirith's influence.

Actions.Name: Cacophony of the Woven
Actions.Content: Area of effect action (30-foot radius sphere centered on a point Vorthirith can see). Each creature within range must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or take 60 (11d10) psychic damage, or half as much on a successful save. Creatures that fail the save are also deafened until the end of their next turn, their thoughts echoing with the dissonance of unwinding reality.

LegendaryActions.Name: Ethereal Gluttony Legendary Action 1 (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: Vorthirith can absorb a fragment of a creature's essence, regaining hit points equal to 10 (1d10 + 6) for each creature that has died within 60 feet of him this turn. This ability allows him to sustain his appetite for chaos.

LegendaryActions.Name: Disjunction Wave Legendary Action 2 (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: Vorthirith targets one creature within 60 feet with a wave of chaotic energy. The creature must make a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, it suffers confusion, unable to take actions until the end of its next turn as fragmented thoughts unravel its focus.

LegendaryActions.Name: Consuming Void Legendary Action 3 (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: Vorthirith unleashes a wave of nullifying energy in a 60-foot cone. Creatures within the area must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 50 (9d10) force damage and are knocked prone, the very ground beneath them strategically fraying as their essence seems to dissolve.
